Summary: Saw 2 bright orbs then beam that was on ground for a few hours on night vision camera.
divs: sighting detailsi was talking to my son in seoul through my laptop on the magicjack phone and next to my computer is my security camera monitor. this was 2 nights ago. i saw one, then two orbs of bright light approach my video camera that is trained on my back yard. it got my attention because they were bright. they were about 4 or 5 inches in diameter. i have 2 cameras that alternate every 5 seconds. they floated slowly by my night vision camera, moving from the right to left. in one shot i saw the first and i said to my son "oh wow, a flashlight!", then the second moved in before the screen went to the other camera and i knew it wasn't a flashlight. when it reverted back, i saw just part of one as it moved to the right and dissappeared out of the screen shot. after the call i went to bed. i woke up at 2:51 and went to get on my laptop. i noticed in my backyard a beam of light like a spotlight that illuminated one spot on my yard. the beam and spot was around 8 foot in diameter. the beam had a slight angle from vertical maybe 15 degrees. the beam was coming from the sky. my camera is on the second floor and i can view over 20 feet above the neighbors rooftops. this beam was coming from the top of the monitor to the ground. i wondered what could be causing it as i have insomnia and many nights i wake up and get on the laptop and never saw something like that. i stuck my head out the back door and the back yard was totally dark, no lights whatsoever. a few cars went by in the front of the house on the street but it didn't alter the spotlight. it appeared just like a spotlight on a stage, you could see through the beam of light. i have a 10x12 large cast aluminum gazebo that had been dismantled and i had the top frame up against the garage and it fell over into my yard sometime this winter. this is a big heavy frame that takes 3 people to lift. the beam was trained right inside that metal frame. the spot of light did not wiggle, it was a solid spot of light that stayed constant. it was only visible on my night vision camera. i noticed that my video camera was not recording, so i tried to figure out what was wrong with it because i have it set to record through the night until 8 am. i couldn't get it to record. that made me a bit nervous. i watched it for about 2 1\2 hours and the beam changed. it had 2 areas of illumination. the first was on the ground and the second was about 6 feet above it. then on top of the second disc of light there was a ball of light that formed. then i got really drowsy and went back to bed. i woke up last night and checked the camera and it was recording correctly again. the beam and spot of light were no longer there, nor had i seen them before or since.
